mapper.select: SELECT post.id , post.deleted , post.created_at as createdAt , post.modified_at as modifiedAt , post.title , post.content FROM post WHERE post.id = #{id}

SELECT post.id FROM post WHERE post.id is not NULL AND post.deleted = #{deleted} AND post.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= post.created_at AND post.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT post.id FROM post WHERE post.id is not NULL AND post.deleted = #{deleted} AND post.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= post.created_at AND post.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY post.created_at ORDER BY post.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(post.id) as listsize FROM post WHERE post.id is not NULL AND post.deleted = #{deleted} AND post.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= post.created_at AND post.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT post.id FROM post WHERE post.id is not NULL AND post.deleted = #{deleted} AND post.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= post.created_at AND post.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND #{createdAt} > post.created_at ORDER BY post.created_at DESC
AND post.created_at > #{createdAt} ORDER BY post.created_at ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
